channel.title: Your Favorite Ideas?
channel.description:
What are some of your favorite ideas/concepts/features (in your opinion) that you have thought about adding into RSC content?
Just wanna get some discussion going. :)
Some of my ideas... 1. Character appearance; hair - add afros 2. I really like the idea of dual wield weapons. Unfortunately, I haven't yet the skills to create such a thing. It would also be cool to make them hit twice as often (6hits). Of course they would be weaker. I would be very impressed if someone could pull this off, but I doubt they could. 3. Slot Machine - 50% chance of doubling the money put in it and 50% chance of losing it all. 4. Kittens!!! (can't decide whether they should follow the player, be used as a ranged weapon, or an edible...)

item.title: Your Favorite Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @lol_k lol k
item.description:
@lol_k wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:10, topic:418856”][quote author=lol k link=topic=521387.msg3790548#msg3790548 date=1319253486]

A Gh0st,

It is a little pre-mature as I am not ready to publicly release the project I am working on but if you would take a look at this demonstration video I recorded and skip to 9:13, I demonstrate how to use the RSCD sprite editor. I plan on re-recording this video in segments with more detail at a later date. Ignore the rest unless you have 35 minutes to sit and watch. Watch it at the highest quality YouTube will let you and full screen it.

Slightly modified RSCD Sprite Editor:
http://www.mediafire.com/?34z0dyynd77a2u8

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vdVBBMReOPQ

Lol fast typer… Also I have been gone for a couple of months are you darscape or marwolf?
[/quote]He clearly logged in as Marwolf…[/quote]
Did not see username I just skipped part way through the video and seen the url. I didn’t know if it was him or if he was letting someone borrow it…

Read full topic

item.title: Your Favorite Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“A Gh0st, post:6, topic:418856”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=521387.msg3789192#msg3789192 date=1319149977]

  1. Just add the sprites…
  2. Not hard, it’s literally nothing but a waste of time.
  3. People play until they’re cleaned then quit. See PP2P.
  4. Following players isn’t hard. I should probably what I’ve done with Npcs to the show off thread one of these days.
    [/quote]

I don’t know how to do this stuff yet. How do you create sprites? Do you have a program I could use?[/quote]Sure do. It’s called Paint.

Read full topic

item.title: Your Favorite Ideas?
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st
item.description:
@A_Gh0st wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

Slot machine… should be like 1 in 5-10 chance of winning 3x loot. If not you would see a major inflation.

Temporary inflation maybe. People would do it until they got cleaned though Lol.

-Nothing:

I could do the dual wield stuff, but I won’t because it’s waste of time.

Way to be THAT guy…

Read full topic

item.title: Your Favorite Ideas?

[quote=“A Gh0st, post:1, topic:418856”]What are some of your favorite ideas/concepts/features (in your opinion) that you have thought about adding into RSC content?

Just wanna get some discussion going.

Some of my ideas…

  1. Character appearance; hair - add afros
  2. I really like the idea of dual wield weapons. Unfortunately, I haven’t yet the skills to create such a thing. It would also be cool to make them hit twice as often (6hits). Of course they would be weaker. I would be very impressed if someone could pull this off, but I doubt they could.
  3. Slot Machine - 50% chance of doubling the money put in it and 50% chance of losing it all.
  4. Kittens!!! (can’t decide whether they should follow the player, be used as a ranged weapon, or an edible…)[/quote]
